name: Rhythm Dive
description:
THE WEB VERSION CANNOT USE BEAT DETECTION. DOWNLOAD THE FULL VERSION BELOW FOR THE INTENDED EXPERIENCE!

Dash through a devilishly difficult track that reacts to YOUR music. Select a song from the game's blazingly energetic soundtrack or from your own mp3 collection and see if you can conquer your music. Very easy to learn, very hard to master!

Controls:

  • Move mouse: Rotate
  • Left click: Jump
  • P or Esc: Pause (Includes settings for rotation sensitivity and volume)
